name: Daxor Corporation
description: Daxor Corporation is a medical instrumentation and biotechnology company that specializes in the development of innovative diagnostic tools for the healthcare industry. Founded in 1983, Daxor is best known for its flagship product, the BVA-100, a blood volume analyzer that measures blood volume and assists in the diagnosis and management of various medical conditions, particularly heart failure and fluid overload. The BVA-100 provides critical information that can help clinicians make informed decisions regarding patient treatment and management. Daxor aims to improve patient outcomes through its advanced technology, which offers real-time insights into blood volume status, thereby enhancing the accuracy of fluid management in critical care settings. Additionally, the company is involved in research and development initiatives to expand its product offerings and improve existing diagnostic tools. Daxor’s commitment to innovation and quality in medical diagnostics underscores its mission to enhance patient care and support healthcare professionals in delivering effective treatment.
